akn:section.akn:heading: Quarterly reports to Congress on conferences sponsored by the Department

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Not later than 30 days after the end of each fiscal quarter, the Secretary shall submit to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs of the Senate and the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs of the House of Representatives a report on covered conferences.
